Package objects.physicalobject

Class Bonus

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
objects.GameObject
objects.physicalobject.Bonus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Bonus
extends GameObject
Bonus in the game scene.

When Animal gets Bonus in the game, Animal gets 1000pts.

  • Field Details

    • bonusImages

      private javafx.scene.image.Image bonusImages
      The first image of Bonus.

    • noImage

      private javafx.scene.image.Image noImage
      The second image of Bonus.

    • actionType

      private ActionType actionType
      Action type of Bonus class.

    • active

      private boolean active
      State of Bonus.

      If it is true, it is visible to the player. Else the player can't get the bonus even when the player gets the bonus.

    • avaliable

      private boolean avaliable
      State of Bonus.

      If it is true, Animal can eat it. When Animal have eaten it, it becomes false and Animal can't eat it or see it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bonus

      public Bonus​(double x, double y, int dim)
      Creates a Bonus.

      It sets the image of Bonus and action type.

      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of Bonus
      y - y coordinate of Bonus
      dim - the diameter of the image

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act​(long now)
      The action that Bonus does in current frame.

      It appears in one of the destination for a period of time and deisappears for a period of time.

      Parameters:
      now - the current time

    • eaten

      public void eaten()
      Sets status to be eaten.
